channel.title: Chemtrails
channel.description:
I see these all the time.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemtrail_conspiracy_theory
Discuss?
P.s. I never said it was true, Just wanna see some opinions.

item.title: Chemtrails
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“akl, post:24, topic:314961”][quote author=inertia link=topic=411400.msg3036626#msg3036626 date=1258822198]

I’m sure that if some organisation wanted to spread chemicals using planes they’d make sure the chemicals didn’t liquify at such ‘high’ temperatures and diffuse into the atmosphere quickly.

why not?

Why not what?
[/quote]
why do you think they would make sure they’re chemicals didn’t liquify at such high temperatures etc.[/quote]

Uh, so that people wouldn’t make up conspiracy theories?

Read full topic

item.title: Chemtrails
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

The water vapour from the exhaust gasses in planes condenses in the sky to leave visible trails of water droplets. What’s so unbelievable about that?

I’m sure that if some organisation wanted to spread chemicals using planes they’d make sure the chemicals didn’t liquify at such ‘high’ temperatures and diffuse into the atmosphere quickly.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“akl, post:12, topic:314961”][quote author=`Lewk_ link=topic=411400.msg3035042#msg3035042 date=1258668725]

When the plane goes high enough the heat conducted from the engines cools so fast and mixes with moist air, the chemtrail happens.
[My logistics]

Very interesting theory. Thank you for sharing.
[/quote]
There isn’t much air at such high altitudes…[/quote]
Sorry, what I meant to say was as the plane is flying up higher then while it’s decreasing. If you’re ever near the engine seat notice how when your up higher, nothing really happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Chemtrails
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:1, topic:314961"]I see these all the time.

en.wikipedia.org

Chemtrail conspiracy theory

The chemtrail conspiracy theory is based on the erroneous belief that long-lasting condensation trails, called "chemtrails" by proponents, consist of chemical or biological agents left in the sky by high-flying aircraft and deliberately sprayed for purposes undisclosed to the general public. Believers in the conspiracy theory argue that normal contrails dissipate relatively quickly and contrails that do not dissipate must contain additional substances. Those who subscribe to the theory s The ...

Discuss?

P.s. I never said it was true, Just wanna see some opinions.[/quote]

You don’t see them all the time, you see contrails all the time. I’m not an expert on this area, but I doubt that if you emit a chemical on a high altitude, it will reach the area you want.

What I don’t understand is that why people believe there is some evil rich group trying to use chemicals and nanochips to control everyone on the earth. If you have money, you can control a population via the media, you don’t need high tech shit for that.

Read full topic
